questions.question: What is the dominant color of the upholstery covering the entire bench?
What fabric-like texture is visually apparent on the bench's surface?
What is the overall shape of the bench's main seating area?
Describe the visible design of the backrest cushions' tops, are they plain or decorative?
What color are the slender, visible legs supporting the bench?
What appears to be the material of the legs supporting this bench?
Considering the backrest, how many distinct cushion sections are clearly visible?
Considering the overall design, what style would best describe this bench?
What is the apparent style of the seams used to assemble the cushions?
Describe the visible texture of the upholstery, is it smooth or rough?
Regarding the cushions, what is their apparent level of firmness or softness?
Describe the visible depth or height of the bench's seat cushion?
What seems to be the visual weight of the piece: heavy, light, or medium?
Considering the backrest, what is the visual height relative to the seat?
What is the apparent height of the bench's legs in relation to the ground?
